title: Can't Access or Interact With Hextech Loot
body: I can see what shards I have and my resource stock, but I can't reroll, forge, open, or combine anything. What might be causing this? I've restarted the client and my computer several times, tried it over two different internets, and can't figure out if I'm just in the wrong place or what.

replies.body: Hmmmmm you mentioned having restarted already, which would have been my first step to take so let's try hitting this problem a little bit harder, shall we? Go ahead and try running a quick repair through the game client if you haven't yet, but regardless let me know if that doesn't help either!
Looks like that fixed it, thanks. I don't know why I hadn't considered that but I guess I considered a UI problem outside the realm of a client tech repair.
